attributes.action: Allow shops to open 24/7 ALL week
attributes.additional_details:
The big supermarkets in England & Wales are open 24/7 for most of the week however due to trading laws can't stay open for a full 24 hours on a Saturday and Sunday. Obviously this also applies for other retailers.

I would like the government to allow trading to take place 24/7 if the retailer and the council agree it is in the interest of the local public.
